item.title: Meetup July 2023 - Intro to Arduino
item.description: Want to find out about Arduino and Don’t know where to start? Come along to the Arduino Introduction Session and find out! When? Last Wednesday of the month, same time, same place: 27th July, 2023, Then Nelson Arms, Tonbridge - from 7.30pm

item.title: Meetup April 2023
item.description: We are having a joint Tonbridge Digital and Tonbridge Maker Space gathering and tinker session on Wednesday 26th April 2023 at 20:00 in the Nelson Arms. Come say hi. We usually have a meetup on the last Wednesday of the month. Same time, same place.

item.title: Meetup March 2023
item.description: We are having a joint Tonbridge Digital and Tonbridge Maker Space gathering and tinker session on Wednesday 29th March 2023 at 20:00 in the Nelson Arms. Come say hi.

item.description: .mc-field-group { padding-right: 10px; padding-bottom: 15px; } Sign up to our email list to hear about meetup details and venues for makerspace events. Enter your email address:

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to Tonbridge Makerspace! We are setting up a makerspace in Tonbridge. Get in touch if you’d like to be involved.

About Tonbridge Maker Space Tonbridge Makespace is a place in Tonbridge that members can visit to make things, meet people, learn, socialise, and collaborate. A place to make your own projects a reality or help others with theirs. We believe in bringing people together in a space, where they can explore their craft, with like minded makers, and feel safe to explore new ideas and find new interests.

Tonbridge Makerspace Constitution Article I: Name and Purpose Section 1: The name of this organisation shall be Tonbridge Makerspace, hereafter referred to as the Makerspace. Section 2: The purpose of the Makerspace is to provide a collaborative environment for individuals to meet, learn, design, build, and share projects, promoting craft, technical, scientific, and artistic skills through social collaboration and education.
